alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Grayson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 5:12PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Alleghany, northwestern Surry and northeastern Wilkes Counties in northwestern North Carolina, southern Carroll and eastern Grayson Counties in southwestern Virginia and the City of Galax through 545 PM EDT... At 512 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mountain Park, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Galax... Sparta... Fries... Fancy Gap... Ennice... Cana... and Mountain Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
